#Text=Ron Jaffe
#Text=Ron
#Text=Jaffe
#Text=is an American photographer .
#Text=He has photographed six U. S. Presidents , legislators , dignitaries and well-known celebrities in the fields of entertainment and sports .
#Text=Early life
#Text=Jaffe was born and raised in Alabama .
#Text=He moved to Los Angeles at the age of 18 to attend Pasadena City College with the goal of becoming a teacher .
#Text=Jaffe became interested in photography when he accompanied a fellow student on a shooting assignment .
#Text=The experience exposed Jaffe to a field he had never considered and he began to pursue his new interest with a passion .
#Text=He continued his coursework and became a teacher with the Pasadena Unified School District , but after a few years , decided to pursue his hobby as a profession .
#Text=Career
#Text=By the early 1970s , Jaffe was working full-time as a freelance photographer .
#Text=He shot fashion publicity photos and commercial ads for his primary clients , which included the designers Barco of California , Jag Swimwear , and DeWeiss .

#Text=In 1974 , Jaffe also began teaching photography at the university level as professor of photography at Chapman College – World Campus Afloat , aboard a ship travelling to South America , Africa and Europe .

#Text=In 1977 , Jaffe signed a contract with Elson Alexandre where over the next two decades he photographed more than 37,000 formal and casual portraits of corporate executives , doctors , attorneys , judges as well as family photos of the company ’s clients .

#Text=During this period Jaffe also shot many celebrity portraits on an independent contractor basis capturing unique images of cowboy stars from Dale Robertson , and Gene Autry to Chuck Connors , Indian Iron Eyes Cody [ 1 ] and Roy Rogers .
#Text=For the last 20 years Jaffe has shot over 500 episodes of high-profile television shows such as Cold Case , CSI Miami , CSI New York , Friends , How I Met Your Mother , [ 2 ] [ 3 ] [ 4 ]
#Text=Mad Men , [ 5 ]
#Text=Rules of Engagement , [ 6 ]
#Text=Suddenly Susan , The West Wing , and Without a Trace , and current shows including Castle , CSI Crime Scene Investigation , [ 7 ]
#Text=Hit the Floor , Jane the Virgin , NCIS , [ 8 ] [ 9 ] NCIS : LA and Scorpion .

#Text=His work on episodic crime dramas involve not only shooting the show during taping , but all props , photos used in the storyline and all crime scene photos showing the circumstances of crime scene investigation for evidence . [ 10 ]
#Text=In essence , Jaffe actually becomes the forensic photographer of episodic dramas .
#Text=In all , Jaffe has shot programs that have aired or are currently airing on the ABC , NBC , CBS , [ 11 ]
#Text=FOX , AMC , VH1 , MTV , A&E , The CW , and CMT networks .
#Text=Because of his work on these shows Jaffe has been nominated twice for the Publicists Guild of America ’s Excellence in Stills Photography Award .
#Text=Awards
#Text=California Museum of Science and Industry Certificate of Achievement for Outstanding Photographer in the documentary category ( 1974 )
#Text=the 1975 Photographer West Award ;
#Text=Black & White Spider Award ( 2005 )
#Text=Certificate of Achievement in Recognition of Outstanding Photography Judges Choice award for Los Angeles Advertising Photographers of America ( 2006 )
#Text=Honorary Color Master Fine Art ( 2007 )
#Text=Photo Journalism Photography Masters Cup ( 2008 )
#Text=International Publicist Guild – nomination for Excellence in Stills Photography award ( 2008 and 2010 )
#Text=Second International Color Awards ( 2013 )
